product_name: DERMA EHydrating Gentle Cleanser with Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDerma E's Ultra Hydrating Gentle Cleanser with Hyaluronic Acid is a deeply moisturizing, sulfate-free cleanser washes away dirt, oil and impurities with no drying, aging after-effects.
details: DetailsBenefitsDeeply moisturizing and gently conditioningThis ultra-hydrating facial cleanser is infused with Hyaluronic Acid, Chamomile, Lemon Grass and Papaya plus antioxidant Vitamins A and E to gently cleanse and condition skin for a soft, smooth, dewy feel with no drying, aging after-effectsFeaturesRecyclable & wind energy certifiedFormulated without GMOs, gluten, or soyKey IngredientsHyaluronic Acid: Known as nature's "moisture magnet", delivers intense moisture, infusing skin with healthy hydrationItem 2528045How To UsePump a small amount of cleanser into dampened hands, then massage over face and neck. Rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsPurified Water, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate (Coconut Derived), Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine (Coconut Derived), Glyceryl Laurate (Vegetable Derived), Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine (Coconut Derived), Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid; Actimoist Bio-1), Panthenol (Provitamin B5), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Retinyl Palmitate (Vitamin A), Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemon Grass) Extract, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Organic Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract*, Allantoin, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Natural Fragrance Oils.*Certified Organic Ingredients.
how_to_use: Pump a small amount of cleanser into dampened hands, then massage over face and neck. Rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.headline: Derma E Cleanser
reviews.comments: My daughter & I liked this cleanser. It leaves our skin smooth.

reviews.headline: Great for dry skin
reviews.comments: I have really dry skin even in summer , this cleanser is great for everyday morning and evening use and it removes makeup just as well.The smell itself is not strong in my opinion nor it smells amazing it just smells like my grandmas house air fresheners lol its a strangely nostalgic smell .

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I am loving this cleanser!  It cleans well, washes away easily and leaves my skin soft without dryness or residue.

reviews.headline: Best Cleanser I've Ever Used!
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser.  I've tried many different brands and even some other Derma E cleansers, and this is hands down the best.  I ran out and tried to use what I had left of other brands and ended up throwing them out so I could go back to this!

reviews.headline: My daily for the last 7 years!
reviews.comments: I discovered this in high school and I have used it ever since. I did find that here lately it doesn't foam like it used to but I still love it. Leaves my skin feeling gery hydrated and not dried out.

reviews.headline: My daily for the last 7 years!
reviews.comments: I discovered this in high school and I have used it ever since. I did find that here lately it doesn't foam like it used to but I still love it. Leaves my skin feeling gery hydrated and not dried out.

reviews.headline: It Is Okay
reviews.comments: I have dry, insanely sensitive skin. I did not have a reaction to this, which is always a plus. That being said, I did not notice it doing anything special for my skin. This is my use it until I find something I like better cleaner. It is just okay.

reviews.headline: Strong scent
reviews.comments: I dont care for the added fragances, they have a drying effect on my skin. I was looking for a product that was light and neutral for my morning routine and this wasnt it. I like Derma E products in general but this one is a pass. I wish the smell wasnt as strong.

reviews.headline: Nice Product
reviews.comments: I used this cleanser when my skin did not need exfoliating. It is light and gentle with little to no smell. My skin was clean, hydrated, soft, and well maintained, with daily use of this product. Is this product going to change your life? Probably not, but with daily use it has the potential to balance out your skin and make breakouts not so frequent.

reviews.headline: Leaves skin feeling clean and hydrated
reviews.comments: I noticed my skin was looking dryafter washing it so I decided to try this hydrating cleanser and to my surprise it left it fresh and hydrated. I no longer have patches of dry skin after washing my face.

reviews.headline: Left skin feeling dry and tight
reviews.comments: This felt very cleansing and was not overly fragrant which I appreciated. It lathers well. However I do not find it to be hydrating at all. My skin felt dry and tight, even after applying moisturizer. Definitely too stripping for my dry skin.

reviews.headline: Works beautifully
reviews.comments: I love this wash. Tough enough for a thorough cleanse, but gentle enough for sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Great Second Cleanse
reviews.comments: Love this to use after an oil/balm cleanse. Skin feels clean but not tight.

reviews.headline: So efficient and gentle
reviews.comments: My skin loves this face wash!

reviews.headline: Wish I could love, causes acne for me :(
reviews.comments: I love the feel of this face wash, and it does cleanse without over-stripping the skin. My skin does seems less dry compared to other cleansers, however, there's one problem: every time I use this I break out. Every time. Which sucks because I used this initially to try to help my (minimal) acne. I get the strangest pimples from it too, they seemingly sprout up overnight and are yet ready to burst. They're different from my normal pimples. I usually don't even get many, but I've used this cleanser maybe twice recently and I've already got 5 new ones :( Maybe look elsewhere if you are acne prone...

reviews.headline: Sticky Residue
reviews.comments: Been trying this for awhile now. I figured out with warm water the sticky residue left after is impossible to get off, but if you use cold water and a cotton pad it helps so much, but only didn't feel the residue one time in my times of using this cleanser. It doesn't strip your skin, but it does break you out if you don't get most or al the residue off. I even use an acid exfoliate and it still had a residue on it. It is weird. I don't understand why it does this: the sticky residue.  I guess I'm gna have to pay more attention and time washing it off with cold water and with a cotton pad. Wash cloth does absolutely nothing to was off. Also, it bubbles like a soap when you wash it off.

reviews.headline: Very Hydrating
reviews.comments: I am shocked and surprised to actually see this product work. Products that are cleansers that claim they're treating, aren't. This one is to my observation. My skin doesn't feel stripped nor somewhat okay. It feels smooth. I haven't noticed a residue yet. I will have to experiment with it since I've only used it twice. I feel like I actually get a "clean" with this cleanser. Not just for the hydrating part but the actual relaxing clean.

reviews.headline: Wonderful line of cleansers
reviews.comments: I use this in the morning and the deep pore cleanser in the evening. This line is gentle yet effective at cleaning thoroughly without stripping your face. I was on the hunt for a gentle cleanser after my beloved Aveeno skin calming gel cleanser was discontinued. The ingredients for all the products I've tried within this brand are exactly what I'm looking for. The packaging is beautiful too.

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
reviews.comments: I recently went on vacation. And used of the face wash that I normally use. So I used my grandmother's face wash which is the derma e one. And I love it. It made my face glowing and got rid of my acne. I went to sprouts yesterday and got a bottle for myself can't wait to use it again!

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: My face still feels dry/tight after washing with this.

properties.name: Describe Yourself

values.label: Sensitive Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin
Mildly sensitive combo skin with hormonal acne

display_values: Mildly sensitive combo skin with hormonal acne
Sensitive Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin

faceoff_positive.comments: Occasionally I can overdo it with my skin care regimen. I am an avid user of AHA & BHA'S, use prescription Retinoic acid every night, and brands send me multiple products to test for review. Overzealous multiple product use can occasionally disturb my skin's acid mantle; leaving my normal to oily skin dehydrated and stressed. I have enjoyed using other Derma E products, so I decided to try this. I was VERY impressed with how well it cleaned, yet left my skin feeling incredibly soft and hydrated. Within a few days my skin was back to normal. I will continue to keep this in my rotation..
faceoff_positive.headline: Better Than I Expected

faceoff_negative.comments: Been trying this for awhile now. I figured out with warm water the sticky residue left after is impossible to get off, but if you use cold water and a cotton pad it helps so much, but only didn't feel the residue one time in my times of using this cleanser. It doesn't strip your skin, but it does break you out if you don't get most or al the residue off. I even use an acid exfoliate and it still had a residue on it. It is weird. I don't understand why it does this: the sticky residue.  I guess I'm gna have to pay more attention and time washing it off with cold water and with a cotton pad. Wash cloth does absolutely nothing to was off. Also, it bubbles like a soap when you wash it off.
faceoff_negative.headline: Sticky Residue

rollup.name: Hydrating Gentle Cleanser with Hyaluronic Acid
